paragraphs.body: Nakauchi is the son of two American internment camp survivors.
paragraphs.text: Nakauchi is the son of two American internment camp survivors.

paragraphs.body: He guest starred in Knots Landing, Star Trek: Deep Space Nine (in the episode "The Homecoming"), Batman: The Animated Series, and ER and lent his voice to the video games Call of Duty: World at War, Syphon Filter: The Omega Strain, Tomb Raider: Legend, and Lost Planet 2. He also played Sgt. Shigeno in the motion picture The Great Raid.
paragraphs.text: He guest starred in Knots Landing, Star Trek: Deep Space Nine (in the episode "The Homecoming"), Batman: The Animated Series, and ER and lent his voice to the video games Call of Duty: World at War, Syphon Filter: The Omega Strain, Tomb Raider: Legend, and Lost Planet 2. He also played Sgt. Shigeno in the motion picture The Great Raid.

paragraphs.body: Nakauchi has also appeared in the Broadway musicals Chu Chem (1989) and The King and I (1996 – 1998). He later starred in the Broadway Asia production of The King and I as King Phra Meha Mongkut.
paragraphs.text: Nakauchi has also appeared in the Broadway musicals Chu Chem (1989) and The King and I (1996 – 1998). He later starred in the Broadway Asia production of The King and I as King Phra Meha Mongkut.
